title: Monaragal Land for Cultivation or Farm
details:
1500 acare Land
Long term lease
2000-2500 LKR per annul lease fee per acare
50,000 per acare for 33 year lease lumsum
Water , 40 feet carpeted road available
three face power lines to the land & byroads
Good soil for Mango/ Pappaya / Dragun fruit /Corne /soya / sugar cane cultivation
